did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Edward Nye Fish, 1827-1914, was a Merchant and businessman in Tucson, Arizona. This collection contains general ledgers and daily cash books dealing with his harness and saddlery shop, butcher shop, and other business interests in Tucson, Ariz. Consists of eight bound volumes.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records of Edward Nye Fish (AZ 139). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: General ledgers and daily cash books dealing with his harness and saddlery shop, butcher shop, and other business interests in Tucson, Ariz. Consists of eight bound volumes.
